author.bio: DevOps Architect & Tech Lead with a passion for AI and LLMs. Building and automating intelligent, scalable systems. Powering Gen AI with modern infrastructure.

marketplaces.name: ClaudeAutoPM Framework
marketplaces.description: Autonomous Project Management Framework - Advanced AI-powered development automation with 53 agents, 112 commands, and comprehensive DevOps integration
marketplaces.repo_description: Autonomous Project Management Framework for Claude Code - Advanced AI-powered development automation

files..claude-plugin/marketplace.json:
{
  "name": "ClaudeAutoPM Framework",
  "description": "Autonomous Project Management Framework - Advanced AI-powered development automation with 53 agents, 112 commands, and comprehensive DevOps integration",
  "version": "1.30.0",
  "owner": {
    "name": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
    "email": "autopm@example.com",
    "url": "https://github.com/rafeekpro/ClaudeAutoPM"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/rafeekpro/ClaudeAutoPM",
  "repository": "https://github.com/rafeekpro/ClaudeAutoPM",
  "license": "MIT",
  "pluginRoot": "./plugins",
  "plugins": [
    {
      "name": "core-agents",
      "source": "./plugins/core-agents",
      "description": "Essential AI agents: agent-manager, code-analyzer, file-analyzer, test-runner",
      "version": "1.30.0",
      "author": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
      "category": "Core",
      "keywords": ["agents", "core", "analysis", "testing"],
      "agents": [
        "@agent-manager",
        "@code-analyzer",
        "@file-analyzer",
        "@test-runner"
      ],
      "commands": [],
      "hooks": [],
      "mcpServers": []
    },
    {
      "name": "devops-suite",
      "source": "./plugins/devops-suite",
      "description": "Complete DevOps automation: Docker, GitHub, Azure DevOps, SSH operations, observability",
      "version": "1.30.0",
      "author": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
      "category": "DevOps",
      "keywords": ["devops", "automation", "ci-cd", "docker", "github"],
      "agents": [
        "@docker-containerization-expert",
        "@github-operations-specialist",
        "@azure-devops-specialist",
        "@ssh-operations-expert",
        "@observability-engineer",
        "@traefik-proxy-expert",
        "@mcp-context-manager"
      ],
      "commands": [
        "/devops:docker-build",
        "/devops:ci-setup",
        "/devops:deploy"
      ],
      "hooks": ["pre-commit-ci", "post-deploy"],
      "mcpServers": []
    },
    {
      "name": "cloud-architects",
      "source": "./plugins/cloud-architects",
      "description": "Multi-cloud architecture: AWS, Azure, GCP specialists with IaC expertise",
      "version": "1.30.0",
      "author": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
      "category": "Cloud",
      "keywords": ["cloud", "aws", "azure", "gcp", "infrastructure", "terraform"],
      "agents": [
        "@aws-cloud-architect",
        "@azure-cloud-architect",
        "@gcp-cloud-architect",
        "@terraform-infrastructure-expert"
      ],
      "commands": [
        "/cloud:provision",
        "/cloud:optimize",
        "/cloud:migrate"
      ],
      "hooks": [],
      "mcpServers": []
    },
    {
      "name": "database-experts",
      "source": "./plugins/database-experts",
      "description": "Database specialists: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, BigQuery, CosmosDB",
      "version": "1.30.0",
      "author": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
      "category": "Databases",
      "keywords": ["database", "sql", "nosql", "postgresql", "mongodb", "redis"],
      "agents": [
        "@postgresql-expert",
        "@mongodb-expert",
        "@redis-expert",
        "@bigquery-expert",
        "@cosmosdb-expert"
      ],
      "commands": [
        "/db:optimize",
        "/db:migrate",
        "/db:backup"
      ],
      "hooks": [],
      "mcpServers": []
    },
    {
      "name": "testing-framework",
      "source": "./plugins/testing-framework",
      "description": "Comprehensive testing: E2E, TDD, performance, security testing with multiple frameworks",
      "version": "1.30.0",
      "author": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
      "category": "Testing",
      "keywords": ["testing", "e2e", "tdd", "playwright", "cypress", "jest"],
      "agents": [
        "@e2e-test-engineer",
        "@tdd-specialist",
        "@performance-testing-expert",
        "@security-testing-specialist"
      ],
      "commands": [
        "/test:e2e",
        "/test:unit",
        "/test:coverage",
        "/test:security"
      ],
      "hooks": ["pre-commit-test", "pre-push-test"],
      "mcpServers": ["playwright"]
    },
    {
      "name": "pm-commands",
      "source": "./plugins/pm-commands",
      "description": "Project Management workflows: Epic decomposition, task management, release planning",
      "version": "1.30.0",
      "author": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
      "category": "Project Management",
      "keywords": ["project-management", "agile", "scrum", "planning", "workflow"],
      "agents": [
        "@project-manager",
        "@agile-coach"
      ],
      "commands": [
        "/pm:epic-decompose",
        "/pm:sprint-plan",
        "/pm:release",
        "/pm:validate",
        "/pm:optimize"
      ],
      "hooks": ["pre-release"],
      "mcpServers": []
    },
    {
      "name": "azure-devops",
      "source": "./plugins/azure-devops",
      "description": "Complete Azure DevOps integration: Boards, Repos, Pipelines, Artifacts",
      "version": "1.30.0",
      "author": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
      "category": "Azure",
      "keywords": ["azure", "devops", "boards", "pipelines", "repos"],
      "agents": [
        "@azure-devops-specialist",
        "@azure-boards-manager"
      ],
      "commands": [
        "/azure:work-item-create",
        "/azure:epic-decompose",
        "/azure:pipeline-run",
        "/azure:pr-create"
      ],
      "hooks": ["azure-sync"],
      "mcpServers": ["azure-devops"]
    },
    {
      "name": "github-automation",
      "source": "./plugins/github-automation",
      "description": "GitHub workflow automation: Actions, releases, PR management",
      "version": "1.30.0",
      "author": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
      "category": "GitHub",
      "keywords": ["github", "actions", "ci-cd", "automation", "workflow"],
      "agents": [
        "@github-operations-specialist"
      ],
      "commands": [
        "/github:release",
        "/github:pr-create",
        "/github:action-create"
      ],
      "hooks": ["pre-commit", "pre-push"],
      "mcpServers": ["github"]
    },
    {
      "name": "language-specialists",
      "source": "./plugins/language-specialists",
      "description": "Language experts: Node.js, JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Bash scripting",
      "version": "1.30.0",
      "author": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
      "category": "Languages",
      "keywords": ["nodejs", "javascript", "typescript", "python", "bash"],
      "agents": [
        "@nodejs-backend-engineer",
        "@javascript-frontend-engineer",
        "@typescript-specialist",
        "@python-backend-engineer",
        "@bash-scripting-expert"
      ],
      "commands": [],
      "hooks": [],
      "mcpServers": []
    },
    {
      "name": "framework-specialists",
      "source": "./plugins/framework-specialists",
      "description": "Framework experts: React, Vue, Angular, Next.js, Django, FastAPI",
      "version": "1.30.0",
      "author": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
      "category": "Frameworks",
      "keywords": ["react", "vue", "angular", "nextjs", "django", "fastapi"],
      "agents": [
        "@react-specialist",
        "@vue-specialist",
        "@angular-specialist",
        "@nextjs-expert",
        "@django-expert",
        "@fastapi-expert"
      ],
      "commands": [
        "/framework:scaffold",
        "/framework:optimize"
      ],
      "hooks": [],
      "mcpServers": []
    },
    {
      "name": "data-engineering",
      "source": "./plugins/data-engineering",
      "description": "Data engineering: ETL pipelines, data modeling, analytics",
      "version": "1.30.0",
      "author": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
      "category": "Data",
      "keywords": ["data", "etl", "analytics", "pipelines", "modeling"],
      "agents": [
        "@data-engineer",
        "@etl-specialist"
      ],
      "commands": [
        "/data:pipeline-create",
        "/data:model-design"
      ],
      "hooks": [],
      "mcpServers": []
    },
    {
      "name": "security-auditing",
      "source": "./plugins/security-auditing",
      "description": "Security tools: Code auditing, vulnerability scanning, compliance checks",
      "version": "1.30.0",
      "author": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
      "category": "Security",
      "keywords": ["security", "audit", "vulnerability", "compliance", "scanning"],
      "agents": [
        "@security-testing-specialist",
        "@security-auditor"
      ],
      "commands": [
        "/security:audit",
        "/security:scan",
        "/security:compliance"
      ],
      "hooks": ["pre-commit-security"],
      "mcpServers": []
    },
    {
      "name": "full-framework",
      "source": "./plugins/full-framework",
      "description": "Complete ClaudeAutoPM framework - all 53 agents, 112 commands, all features",
      "version": "1.30.0",
      "author": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
      "category": "Complete",
      "keywords": ["all", "complete", "framework", "full-stack"],
      "agents": ["*"],
      "commands": ["*"],
      "hooks": ["*"],
      "mcpServers": ["*"],
      "dependencies": [
        "core-agents",
        "devops-suite",
        "cloud-architects",
        "database-experts",
        "testing-framework",
        "pm-commands",
        "azure-devops",
        "github-automation",
        "language-specialists",
        "framework-specialists",
        "data-engineering",
        "security-auditing"
      ]
    }
  ]
}
